All my projects

Following are projects started by me.

SpotLight (Misconduct management System

  • Started: January 2017-present
  • Website: https://www.spotlightreporting.com
    • Restful API constructing & mapping in Groovy/Grails frontend project

Provides cloud-based financial and non-financial reporting. This is a micro service architecture based project where backend is in Spring & frontend in Grails & Angular 4.

Amar Uddog (Smart Solution for SME)

  • Started: January 2017-present
  • Website: http://www.amaruddog.com
    • Team Lead & Manage Project

A Multi Module Service based Platform for any Kind of business where Accounting, Sales, Stock, CRM, HRM and Tracking Business Zone using a single Mobile.

Care Management

  • Started: March 2016-present
  • Website: http://www.synergyinfoconnect.com
    • Implement java backend code & constructing JSON responded API for Mobile Apps
    • Java(Spring, Android), Bootstrap, Ractive.js, jQuery, Spring Security, Jasper report

Provides a secure, easy-to-use, cloud-based Collaborative & Customized Healthcare platform. Also have an Android Apps for patients for chronic diseases.

eCounseling (Misconduct management System)

  • Started: 2009-2014 (still operating)
  • Website: https://dev.raydarresearch.com/echo_platform
    • Requirement Analysis and Design and coding
    • Java(Groovy/Grails), Bootstrap, Angular.js, jQuery, Spring Security, Hazelcast

Creating a misconduct case against employee and then HR Admin open the case and the HR manager added Counsellor for the case and taken action will close that case.

Marcommune

  • Integrate Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Google SDK for posting, getting profile Information, redesign project flow.
  • Java(Groovy/Grails), Bootstrap, Hidelbark, Spring Security
  • Website: https://www.marcommune.com

This is a cloud based public relations and marketing platform that gives once full digitization, personalization, and collaboration capabilities.

Diarobo (Diabetic patient, Care Giver and Doctor –activities, notification and Prescriptions management and Intelligence)

  • Java(Spring, Groovy/Grails, Android), Bootstrap, Angular.js, jQuery, Spring Security, Realm
  • Research, Implementing and lead the team
  • On Going Project

This apps for the diabetic patient for monitoring health record & act as a nurse who always notify the patient for regular meal, exercise, medication, wake up, regular health checkup.

G-School (Next Generation School Management System)

  • Started: 2016-2017
  • Java(Groovy/Grails), Bootstrap, Angular.js, jQuery, Spring Security, Jasper report, Realm
  • Website: http://www.bailyschool.com

School Result, Fingerprint Attendance device integration, Library Automation, Student performance, Accounting, Inventory Management, SMS Integration and 20+ features.
